jesus_quiz_modules: Jesus’ Christ Advent Prophecies in the Old Testament

Old and New Testaments.question: What does “Bible” mean?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Bible gets its name from a Greek word meaning “books”.

Old and New Testaments.question: The Bible is sacred to
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Bible is sacred to the Christian and Jewish religion.

Old and New Testaments.question: The Old Testament is also called
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Old Testament is also called the 'HebrewBible'.

Old and New Testaments.question: What are the three parts of the Old Testament?
Old and New Testaments.option1: The Pentagon, The Prophets, The Writings
Old and New Testaments.option3: The Pentateuch, The Prophets, The Writings
Old and New Testaments.answer: The Pentateuch, The Prophets, The Writings
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The three parts of the Old Testament are The Pentateuch, The Prophets, The Writings.

Old and New Testaments.question: The Pentateuch includes
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Pentateuch includes five books: Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy

Old and New Testaments.question: The Pentateuch is also called
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Pentateuch is also called The Five Books of Moses

Old and New Testaments.question: The Gospel includes
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Gospel includes four books: St Matthew, St Mark, St Luke, St John

Old and New Testaments.question: How many books are included in the Old Testament?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: There are 39 books included in the Old Testament.

Old and New Testaments.question: 'JesusChrist' is mentioned in
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: 'JesusChrist' is mentioned in the New Testament

Old and New Testaments.question: How many books are included in the New Testament?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: There are included 27 books in the New Testament.

Old and New Testaments.question: In what language was the Old Testament written?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Old Testament was originally almost entirely written in ancient Hebrew, with a few short elements in Aramaic.

Old and New Testaments.question: In what language was the New Testament written?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: Probably in Greek, though some may have been first written in Aramaic

Old and New Testaments.question: When was the first translation of the Bible made into English?
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The first translation of the Bible was made into English in 1382 A.D. by John Wycliffe.

Old and New Testaments.question: What is the Gutenberg Bible
Old and New Testaments.full_answer: The Gutenberg Bible is the first book ever printed (in 1454 A.D. by Johannes Gutenberg who invented the 'typemold' for the printing press.)

Jesus Christ.question: Jesus was born in
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus was born in Bethlehem, Judea

Jesus Christ.question: Who visited Mary before Jesus Birth
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Angel Gabriel visited Mary before Jesus Birth.

Jesus Christ.question: The infant Christ was visited by the
Jesus Christ.full_answer: The infant Christ was visited by the Magi.

Jesus Christ.question: Where did Jesus visit as a boy?
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus visited the Second Temple as a boy.

Jesus Christ.question: Jesus was baptized by
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus was baptized by John the Baptist, Jordan River.

Jesus Christ.question: The Gospel includes
Jesus Christ.full_answer: The Gospel includes four books: St Matthew, St Mark, St Luke, St John

Jesus Christ.question: 'Christ' means
Jesus Christ.option1: in English Jesus, in Greek Messiah
Jesus Christ.option2: in English the anointed one, in Hebrew Messiah
Jesus Christ.option3: in English Baptist in Greek Christianity
Jesus Christ.answer: in English the anointed one, in Hebrew Messiah
Jesus Christ.full_answer: 'Christ' means in English the anointed one, in Hebrew Messiah.

Jesus Christ.question: Jesus first miracle was
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus first miracle was turning water into wine.

Jesus Christ.question: How many apostles did Jesus nomiante?
Jesus was betrayed by
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus was betrayed by Judas Iscariot.

Jesus Christ.question: Jesus was executed on the orders of
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus was executed on the orders of Pontius Pilate.

Jesus Christ.question: Jesus Christ was crucified in
Jesus Christ.full_answer: Jesus Christ was crucified in 30 AD.

Jesus Christ.question: After his resurrection, Jesus first appeared to
Jesus Christ.full_answer: After his resurrection, Jesus first appeared to Mary Magdalene.

Jesus Christ.question: What is the Gutenberg Bible
Jesus Christ.full_answer: The Gutenberg Bible is the first book ever printed (in 1454 A.D. by Johannes Gutenberg who invented the 'typemold' for the printing press.)

Jesus’ Christ Advent Prophecies in the O.question: For to us a child is born...and the government will be on his shoulders...He will reign on David`s throne and over his kingdom... (9:6-7)
But you, Bethlehem Ephrathah, though you are small among the clans of Judah, out of you will come for me one who will be ruler over Israel, whose origins are from of old, from ancient times. (5:2)
Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel, and with the house of Judah. (31:31)
Hear you now, O house of David... Therefore the LORD himself shall give you a sign; A virgin shall conceive, and bear a son, and shall call his name Immanuel. (7:13-14)
All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all. (53:6)
For it is not an enemy who reproaches me...But it is you, a man my equal, my companion and my familiar friend. (55:12-14)

Then the LORD said to me, “Throw it to the potter, that magnificent price at which I was valued by them.” So I took the thirty shekels of silver and threw them to the potter in the house of the LORD (11:13)
I gave My back to those who strike Me, And My cheeks to those who pluck out the beard; I did not cover My face from humiliation and spitting. (50:6 I)
For dogs have surrounded me; A band of evildoers has encompassed me; They pierced my hands and my feet. (22:16)
Commit yourself to the LORD; let Him deliver him; Let Him rescue him, because He delights in him ( 22:8)

And I will pour out on the house of David and on the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the Spirit of grace and of supplication, so that they will look on Me whom they have pierced; and they will mourn for Him, as one mourns for an only son, and they will weep bitterly over Him, like the bitter weeping over a first-born (12:10)
And it will come about in that day, declares the Lord GOD, That I shall make the sun go down at noon And make the earth dark in broad daylight. (8:9)
I am poured out like water, And all my bones are out of joint; My heart is like wax; It is melted within me. (22:14)
When Israel was a child, I loved him, and out of Egypt I called my son. (11:1)
He was oppressed and afflicted, yet he did not open his mouth; he was led like a lamb to the slaughter, and as a sheep before her shearers is silent, so he did not open his mouth. (53:7)
After two days will he revive us: in the third day he will raise us up, and we shall live in his sight (6:2)

Apostles.question: Apostle means in Greek
Apostles.full_answer: Apostle in Greek: someone sent forth, envoy, messenger.

Apostles.question: Which apostle was nicknamed 'rock' by Jesus?
Apostles.full_answer: Apostle Peter was nicknamed 'rock' by Jesus.

Apostles.question: Which apostle was the brother of Peter
Apostles.full_answer: Andrew was the brother of Peter.

Apostles.question: Which apostles were the sons of Zebedee?
Apostles.full_answer: James and John were the sons of Zebedee.

Apostles.question: The Gospel includes
Apostles.full_answer: The Gospel includes four books: St Matthew, St Mark, St Luke, St John

Apostles.question: Which apostle is sometimes called Nathanael?
Matthew was
Apostles.full_answer: Matthew was a tax collector from Capernaum.

Apostles.question: Which apostle doubted the resurrection of Jesus?
Apostles.full_answer: Thomas doubted the resurrection of Jesus.

Apostles.question: How many apostles did Jesus nomiante?
Jesus was betrayed by
Apostles.full_answer: Jesus was betrayed by Judas Iscariot.

Apostles.question: Who was chosen to replace Judas Iscariot?
Apostles.full_answer: Matthias was chosen to replace Judas Iscariot.

Apostles.question: Was Paul one of the Twelve nominated by Jesus?
Apostles.full_answer: Paul was not one of the Twelve, though many times considered in Christianity as an Apostle.

Apostles.question: Who are most prominent figures, after Jesus, in infant Christianity?
Apostles.full_answer: Apostle Peter and Paul of Tarsus are most prominent figures, after Jesus, in infant Christianity.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: The 3 Patriarchs are
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.option1: Jesus, John the Baptist and Virgin Mary
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: The 3 Patriarchs are Abraham, Isaac and Jacob.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: The 4 Matriarchs are
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.option1: Virgin Mary, Mary Magdalene, Mary Tudor
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: The 4 Matriarchs are Sarah, Rebecca, Leah and Rachel.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Sarah is the wife of
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Sarah is the wife of Abraham.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Rebecca is the mother of
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Rebecca is the mother of Esau and Jacob.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Leah and Rachel are
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Leah and Rachel are sisters and the wives of Jacob.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Hagar is
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.option1: the wife of Abraham and mother of Ishmael
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Hagar is the wife of Abraham, mother of Ishmael and handmaid of Sarah.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Where was Abraham commanded by God to offer his son, Isaac, up as a sacrifice?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Abraham was commanded by God to offer his son, Isaac, up as a sacrifice on Mount Moriah.'

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Which Patriarch was also called Israel?
Which are the Abrahamic Religions?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Judaism, Christianity and Islam are the Abrahamic religions.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: How old were Abraham and Sarah when they gave birth to Isaac?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: When they gave birth to Isaac, Abraham was 100 years old and Sarah 90.

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Where was Abraham born?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Abraham and his family were originally from the city of Ur, Chaldea

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: How many children did Jacob have?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: Jacob had 13 children (12 sons, the tribes of Israel and 1 daughter, Dina).

Patriarchs and Matriarchs.question: Where is located The Cave of the Patriarchs?
Patriarchs and Matriarchs.full_answer: The Cave of the Patriarchs is located in the ancient city of Hebron

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Who is the firstborn son of Jacob?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Reuben is the firstborn son of Jacob.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Who is the twelfth (last) son of Jacob?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Benjamin is the twelfth son of Jacob.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Who fathered the Ephraim and Manasseh tribes?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Joseph fathered the Ephraim and Manasseh tribes.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: King David and Jesus were from the tribe of
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: King David and Jesus were from the tribe of Judah.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Which tribe was blessed by Jacob: 'he will provide the king`s delights.'
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Asher was blessed by Jacob: 'he will provide the king`s delights'.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Which tribe is described as still residing in ships?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Dan is described as still residing in ships.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: The mother of Gad was
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: The mother of Gad was Zilpah.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: According to Jewish tradition the descendants of Issachar are
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: According to Jewish tradition the descendants of Issachar are men of learning.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Samson is from the tribe of
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Samson is from the tribe of Dan.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Which tribe was distinguished as servant to God and thus was not allocated any territory?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Levi tribe was distinguished as servant to God and thus was not allocated any territory.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Which tribe were described as brave soldiers in the Song of Deborah?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: The Naphtali tribe were described as brave soldiers in the Song of Deborah.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Who stayed behind as collateral for Benjamin so that his brothers would return from Canaan to Egypt?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Simeon stayed behind as collateral for Benjamin so that his brothers would return from Canaan to Egypt.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: To whom refers: 'he will be a harbour for ships'?
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: To Zebulun refers: 'he will be a harbour for ships'.

12 Tribes of Israel.question: Moses is from the tribe of
12 Tribes of Israel.full_answer: Moses is from the tribe of Levi.
